title: The Hobbit An Unexpected Journey 2012 Extended Edition BRrip 108
description:
Please leave feedback!

Source: Bluray

Used denoise & sharpening filters, looks extremely crisp.  Subtitles were done myself, English is hard subbed for foreign dialogue, external .srt has foreign dialogue excluded so everyone wins.  Commentary included.

I used the 3D extended edition as source because the bitrate was higher due to there being 2 discs.  Commentary taken from the regular extended edition release.
